name: node_events
description: - Your objective is to create a server that can handle a post request to “/newsletter_signup” - You must read and decode the request body (which will contain a name and email), and append the contact information to a csv file (your newsletter list) - CONSTRAINT: When the client request is a “POST” method to the url “/newsletter_signup”, you will emit a ‘signup’ event. A listener associated with this event will handle your logic
